title: Mistaken Hero
description: She's a mafia princess.I'm an anti-hero.She's running from her past.I've put my dark past behind me.Until she mistakes me for her hero.I'm no hero.And I'm definitely not hers.I already found my happily ever after.One she decided to ruin.Now I want revenge.Let the retribution games begin.This is book one in a dark romantic suspense series. Ends on a cliffhanger.Series Order: Mistaken HeroForbidden PrincessTempted HeroFatal PrincessTortured HeroDangerous Princess
author: Ella Miles
